Text.Line: Oh crap...
Hey you there...
What are you doing here? Don't you know where you are?
You could get yourself killed if you run into the wrong people around here.

Responses.Response: I.. I'm lost and trying to find my way back to civilization.

Text.Line: Well you've picked a dangerous path to travel.
This is amazon land and they don't take kindly to strange men.
You better get out of here, while you still can.
Me? Well no, I'm just a serving girl.
I'm out here gathering herbs for some of the prisoners.

Responses.Response: Phew, I though I was in trouble for a minute there.

Text.Line: Well you're lucky, there are patrols walking these woods as well.
If you had run into any of those you would have been captured or even killed.
Although judging by the state of the prisoners I'm not sure which would be better.
Yeah, the few that are left are in a pretty bad state.
Having trouble walking, hihi...
I know I shouldn't laugh but they we're so full of themselves when they were caught.
Well, lets just say their manhood was tested.
You need to be pretty resilient to pass the testing.
And they were not, hihi...

Responses.Response: They sound like whimps to me.
Sounds rough, I better avoid them at all costs, do you happen to know a way out of here?

Text.Line: Ha! I doubt you would do any better.
You look pretty scrawney compared to them.
I doubt you would last more then a few minutes.

Responses.Response: Well, perhaps I should try to avoid being tested. Do you happen to know a way out of here?

Text.Line: Typical male, all arogant and full of bravado.
Well good luck finding your way outta here.
If you get caught I'll definately be there to watch you taken down a notch.

Responses.Response: Hey hang on a minute, no need to be like that.

Text.Line: Smart man, sure, just keep to the left, and you'll come across a bridge.
Cross that and stick to the path.
That should take you out of the forrest and out of amazon territory.

Responses.Response: Thanks a lot, you've been a great help.

Text.Line: She walk off...
